name: wind-layer
description: a openlayers ol bmap amap maptalks extension to windjs
author: sakitam-fdd <smilefdd@gmail.com>

scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development input=index.js file=windLayer rollup -wm -c build/rollup.dev.config.js
scripts.dev:ol: cross-env NODE_ENV=development input=ol/index.js file=OlWindy rollup -wm -c build/rollup.dev.config.js
scripts.dev:openlayers: cross-env NODE_ENV=development input=openlayers/index.js file=OlWind rollup -wm -c build/rollup.dev.config.js
scripts.dev:bmap: cross-env NODE_ENV=development input=bmap/index.js file=BMapWind rollup -wm -c build/rollup.dev.config.js
scripts.dev:amap: cross-env NODE_ENV=development input=amap/index.js file=AMapWind rollup -wm -c build/rollup.dev.config.js
scripts.dev:maptalks: cross-env NODE_ENV=development input=maptalks/index.js file=MaptalksWindy rollup -wm -c build/rollup.dev.config.js
scripts.build:ol: cross-env NODE_ENV=production input=ol/index.js file=OlWindy rollup -m -c build/rollup.dev.config.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=production input=ol/index.js file=OlWindy rollup -c build/rollup.prod.config.js
scripts.build:openlayers: cross-env NODE_ENV=production input=openlayers/index.js file=OlWind rollup -m -c build/rollup.dev.config.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=production input=openlayers/index.js file=OlWind rollup -c build/rollup.prod.config.js
scripts.build:amap: cross-env NODE_ENV=production input=amap/index.js file=AMapWind rollup -m -c build/rollup.dev.config.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=production input=amap/index.js file=AMapWind rollup -c build/rollup.prod.config.js
scripts.build:bmap: cross-env NODE_ENV=production input=bmap/index.js file=BMapWind rollup -m -c build/rollup.dev.config.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=production input=bmap/index.js file=BMapWind rollup -c build/rollup.prod.config.js
scripts.build:maptalks: cross-env NODE_ENV=production input=maptalks/index.js file=MaptalksWindy rollup -m -c build/rollup.dev.config.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=production input=maptalks/index.js file=MaptalksWindy rollup -c build/rollup.prod.config.js
scripts.build: npm run build:ol && npm run build:openlayers && npm run build:bmap && npm run build:amap && npm run build:maptalks && cross-env NODE_ENV=development input=index.js file=windLayer rollup -m -c build/rollup.dev.config.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=production input=index.js file=windLayer rollup -c build/rollup.prod.config.js
